mutants.original_line: min_freq_chars = [k for k, v in freq_map.items() if v == min_freq]
mutants.mutated_line: min_freq_chars = [k for (k, v) in freq_map.items() if v != min_freq]

mutants.original_line: max_freq_chars = [k for k, v in freq_map.items() if v == max_freq]
mutants.mutated_line: max_freq_chars = [k for (k, v) in freq_map.items() if v != max_freq]

mutants.original_line: return "The frequencies of characters are: {}\nMost frequent character(s): {}\nLeast frequent character(s): {}".format(freq_map, max_freq_chars, min_freq_chars)
